      • giveKit

        public static KitResponse giveKit(String kitName,
                  org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                  Boolean chargeCost)
        Gives the specified player to specified kit.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to give the player.
        player - The player to give the kit to.
        chargeCost - Whether or not to charge the player via econ.
        Returns:
        A detailed response of the action, if successful, and if not, the cause of failure.

      • kitFileExists

        public static Boolean kitFileExists(String kitName)
        Checks if the file of the specified kit exists. Please use kitExists(String) to properly check if the kit exists.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the kit file exists, else false.

      • kitExists

        public static Boolean kitExists(String kitName)
        Checks if the kit exists. This is the preferred method to use.
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to check for.
        Returns:
        true if the kit exists, else false.

        Sets the delay, in seconds, for the kit.

        true if successful, else false.

      • setItem

        public static boolean setItem(String kitName,
              String item)
        Sets the item to be displayed in the kit selector GUI. In one of the following formats: ITEM_NAME:damageMod or ITEM_NAME
        Parameters:
        kitName - The name of the kit to set data to.
        item - The item to display.
        Returns:
        true if successful, else false.
